snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown requested an increase to the supply of fuel by allowing refineries to immediately transition to a blend of gasoline that is typically not sold until November.
abstract: Gov Jerry Brown directs California Air Resources board to take emergency steps address high gas prices in state.

byline.contributor: Michael Schwirtz contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown requested an increase to the supply of fuel by allowing refineries to immediately transition to a blend of gasoline that is typically not sold until November.

headline.seo: Jerry Brown Moves to Reduce Gas Prices in California
headline.main: California Moves to Reduce Gas Prices
headline.print_headline: California Moves to Reduce Gas Prices
